thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I have been going to Town Fair - New London for many years and have always had excellent service. This recent service was no different. The required and performed work has always been described before and after so there is no surprises. Would recommend to anyone.
